name: Ad-stroid dodger
description:
Dodge the asteroids and watch out for those pesky ads

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys: move

Mouse Click: eliminate ads

Music used:

Hall of the Mountain King by Kevin MacLeod http://incompetech.com
